LanguageData.AvaliBasicTempControl.label: Basic Temperature Control Augment [TCA]
LanguageData.AvaliBasicTempControl.description: This augment, sometimes refered to as a T.C.A, has the ability to assist in regulating the body temperature of Avali.
LanguageData.AvaliAdvTempControl.label: Advanced Temperature Control Augment [TCA]
LanguageData.AvaliAdvTempControl.description: This augment, sometimes refered to as a T.C.A, has the ability to assist in regulating the body temperature of Avali.
LanguageData.AvaliEliteTempControl.label: Elite Temperature Control Augment [TCA]
LanguageData.AvaliEliteTempControl.description: This augment, sometimes refered to as a T.C.A, has the ability to assist in regulating the body temperature of Avali.
